Caprelsa.drugInfo: Caprelsa is part of the Kinase Inhibitors class and treats Thyroid Cancer. Kinase inhibitors are used to treat cancers such as leukemia, breast cancer, melanoma, lung cancer, and renal cancer. They are also used in the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis and to prevent organ transplant rejection. They work by stopping cancer cell growth and preventing the spread of the cells. Caprelsa is only available as a brand name drug.  Compare kinase inhibitors.

Lotrimin.drugInfo: Lotrimin is part of the Azole Antifungals class and treats Athlete's Foot, Jock Itch, and Ringworm. Azole antifungals are used to treat thrush, yeast infection, candidiasis, tinea versicolor, athlete's foot, jock itch, ringworm, nail fungus, fungal infections, and seborrheic dermatitis. They work by slowing down and preventing the growth of fungus. Lotrimin is only available as a brand name drug.  Compare azole antifungals.

Ilaris.drugInfo: Ilaris is part of the Monoclonal Antibodies class and treats Rheumatoid Arthritis. Monoclonal antibodies are used to treat many diseases, including cancer; autoimmune diseases like rheumatoid arthritis or Crohn's disease; and respiratory syncytial virus in children. They work by replacing or substituting antibodies in the body's immune system that specifically target certain antigens (harmful substances that can provok an immune response). Ilaris is only available as a brand name drug.  Compare monoclonal antibodies.

Pneumovax 23.description: PNEUMOCOCCAL VACCINE, POLYVALENT (NEU mo KOK al  vak SEEN,  pol ee VEY luhnt) is a vaccine to prevent pneumococcus bacteria infection. These bacteria are a major cause of ear infections, Strep throat infections, and serious pneumonia, meningitis, or blood infections worldwide. These vaccines help the body to produce antibodies that help your body defend against these bacteria. This vaccine is recommended for people 2 years of age and older with health problems. It is also recommended for all adults over 50 years old. This vaccine will not treat an infection.

Prevnar 13.description: PNEUMOCOCCAL VACCINE is a vaccine used to prevent pneumococcus bacterial infections. These bacteria can cause serious infections like pneumonia, meningitis, and blood infections. This vaccine will lower your chance of getting pneumonia. If you do get pneumonia, it can make your symptoms milder and your illness shorter. This vaccine will not treat an infection and will not cause infection. This vaccine is recommended for infants and young children, adults with certain medical conditions, and adults 65 years or older.

selfemra.drugInfo: Selfemra is part of the SSRIs class and treats PMDD. SSRIs are used to elevate mood to treat depression, anxiety, eating disorders, PMDD, and obsessive-compulsive disorder. rajani.description: DROSPIRENONE; ETHINYL ESTRADIOL; LEVOMEFOLATE is an oral contraceptive (birth control pill). This medicine combines two types of female hormones, an estrogen and a progestin. This medicine also has levomefolate, a B vitamin. It is used to prevent ovulation and pregnancy. It is also used to treat the symptoms of premenstrual dysphoric disorder (PMDD), to treat acne, and to raise folate levels in women who want to use birth control.

Tandem.description: IRON replaces iron that is essential to healthy red blood cells. Iron is used to treat iron deficiency anemia. Anemia may cause problems like tiredness, shortness of breath, or slowed growth in children. Only take iron if your doctor has told you to. Do not treat yourself with iron if you are feeling tired. Most healthy people get enough iron in their diets, particularly if they eat cereals, meat, poultry, and fish.

Thyrolar.description: LEVOTHYROXINE sodium and LIOTHYRONINE sodium (lye oh THYE roe neen), also known as Liotrix, is a combination of 2 thyroid hormones. It also helps to treat goiter (an enlarged thyroid gland). It is also used to treat some kinds of thyroid cancer along with surgery and other medicines.

It lowers blood pressure and increases the amount of urine passed, which causes the body to lose salt and water. Clonidine also lowers blood pressure.

Renin inhibitor / calcium channel blocker / thiazide diuretic combinations are used to treat hypertension. The combination of active ingredients lowers blood pressure by relaxing blood vessels and removing excess water and salt from the body. Amturnide is only available as a brand name drug. Beta blocker / thiazide diuretic combinations are used to lower blood pressure to treat hypertension. They work by removing excess water and salt from the body and slowing down the heart. Dutoprol is only available as a brand name drug.  Compare beta blocker / thiazide diuretic combinations.

Nitropress(sodium nitroprusside).drugInfo: Nitropress is part of the Arteriolar Vasodilators class and treats Hypertension. Arteriolar vasodilators lower blood pressure to treat hypertension and angina by relaxing blood vessels allowing easier blood flow. Nitropress is available in both brand and generic forms. Vecamyl.drugInfo: Vecamyl is part of the Alpha Blockers class and treats Hypertension. Alpha blockers are used to treat benign prostatic hyperplasia and hypertension by relaxing the muscles in the prostate and by relaxing blood vessels making blood flow to the heart smoother. Vecamyl is only available as a brand name drug.  Compare alpha blockers.

Prexxartan.drugInfo: Prexxartan is part of the ARBs class and treats Hypertension, Heart Attack, and Heart Failure. ARBs are used to lower blood pressure to treat hypertension, heart failure, diabetic nephropathy, coronary artery disease, and heart attack. They work by relaxing blood vessels allowing more efficient pumping of the heart. Prexxartan is only available as a brand name drug.  Compare ARBs.

Covera-Hs.drugInfo: Covera-Hs is part of the Calcium Channel Blockers class and treats Hypertension and Angina. Calcium channel blockers are used to lower blood pressure to treat hypertension, angina, atrial fibrillation, and migraines. They work by relaxing blood vessels allowing blood to flow easier to different parts of the body. Covera-Hs is only available as a brand name drug.  Compare calcium channel blockers.

Inderal XL.description: PROPRANOLOL is a beta-blocker. Beta-blockers reduce the workload on the heart and help it to beat more regularly. This medicine is used to treat high blood pressure, heart muscle disease, and prevent chest pain caused by angina. It is also used to prevent migraine headaches. You should not use this medicine to treat a migraine that has already started.

Rolaids.drugInfo: Rolaids is part of the Alkalinizing Agents class and treats Heartburn. Alkalinizing agents are used to treat conditions associated with a low pH in the body. Some medications can work to treat gout and kidney stones by neutralizing uric acid in the blood and urine to keep down inflammation of the joints, and to prevent the formation of stones in the kidney. Others like sodium bicarbonate are available without a prescription to ease heartburn and acid indigestion. Rolaids is only available as a brand name drug.  Compare alkalinizing agents.

Pepcid Complete(famotidine complete).drugInfo: Pepcid Complete is part of the Histamine-2 Antagonists class and treats Heartburn. Histamine-2 antagonists are used to treat heartburn, duodenal ulcers, gastric ulcers, and GERD. They work by reducing acid in the stomach to treat symptoms by blocking histamine. Pepcid Complete is available in both brand and generic forms.  Compare histamine-2 antagonists.

dexlansoprazole.drugInfo: Dexlansoprazole is part of the Proton Pump Inhibitors class and treats Heartburn and GERD. Proton pump inhibitors are used to treat GERD, gastric ulcers, duodenal ulcers, and heartburn. They work by healing the esophagus and by decreasing the amount of stomach acid. Dexlansoprazole is only available as a generic drug.  Compare proton pump inhibitors.

Travoprost is available in both brand and generic forms.  Compare prostaglandins.

Pregnyl.description: HUMAN CHORIONIC GONADOTROPIN is a hormone. HCG is used for different reasons in men and women. HCG is used in combination with other fertility drugs to increase a woman's chance of pregnancy. In men or adolescent boys, HCG helps the production of testosterone and sperm. HCG is also used in male children with cryptorchidism, a specific birth problem of the testes.

Aralast NP.drugInfo: Aralast NP is part of the Human Alpha-1 Proteinase Inhibitors class and treats Alpha-1 Antitrypsin Deficiency. Human alpha-1 proteinase inhibitor (also known as alpha-1 antitrypsin) is a protein normally present in the body that helps prevent breakdown of tissues in the lungs. A deficiency of alpha-1 proteinase inhibitor can lead to emphysema. This deficiency is a genetic disorder and can't be cured, but replacement of the protein can maintain and treat symptoms. Aralast NP is only available as a brand name drug.  Compare human alpha-1 proteinase inhibitors.
